subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In 2006 Carlos Beltran, now the Cardinals’ slugging right fielder, froze on a called third strike to end the Mets’ season in Game 7 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: In 2006 Carlos Beltran, now the Cardinals’ slugging right fielder, froze on a called third strike to end the Mets’ season in Game 7 of the N.L.C.S.
